DOC.brief_summary: Our hypothesis is that a new method of depth of anaesthesia monitoring, using theoretically based time series modelling will result in improved ability to determine nitrous oxide anaesthetic effect
DOC.brief_title: Quantifying Nitrous Oxide Effect on Depth of Anaesthesia Using Theoretically Based Time Series Modelling
DOC.detailed_description: We randomised patients to 0% 33% or 66% nitrous oxide during sevoflurane induction and measured anesthetic endpoints.
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 years or older Presenting for surgery under general anaesthesia Poor English language comprehension Risk of reflux Epilepsy or other EEG abnormality
